title: Stranger Than Fiction: Neal Stephenson
description: Tim Wu talks with Neal Stephenson, a science fiction writer and author of such books as Anathem and Snow Crash. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
itunes:author: Slate
